attributes.action: arrange pardon or whatever clemency he can for Patricia Tabram
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the conviction of Patricia Tabram for the cultivation of cannabis, we demand the Prime Minister pardon or do whatever he can to ensure her freedom and accept that what she did was no crime.  This conviction is a farce and demonstrates that the Prime Minister must try to ammend this countries currently malfunctioning laws and ensure that they fit with the culture of modern Britain.
